properties.description: Set that toggle is a form element               Value: checkbox
properties.name: _formElement

properties.description: Checkbox checked status               Values can be: true or false
properties.name: checked

properties.description: Sets checked status by default when the element is reset             Values can be: true or false
properties.name: default

properties.description: Space that occupy the toggle inside parent container.              By default, its size adapts to its content              Values can be: true or false              Default: true
properties.name: inline

properties.description: Toggle name for the form functionality
properties.name: name

properties.description: Toggles the readonly status of the checkbox               Default: false
properties.name: readonly

properties.description: Toggle value for the form functionality
properties.name: value

methods.description: Resets checked status of the element to the default one
methods.name: reset
